lines: CS 650AH 357CH 343SDAH 236
165NDA KU YANDA
I LOVE THEE
Doh is Eb
Nda yanda, nda yanda, Nda ku yandisya;
Ndayanda, Muvuni, Nda yanda Leza;
Nda yanda, nda yanda, Kuzyiba iwe;
Milimo I la ku Tondezya oku.
Nda seka, nda seka Kambo kabotu!
Kukomana kwangu, Ta ku kwe ku fwa!
Nda yeya lubono O lu li kwakwe,
Nda yanda ku bona Mufutuli ko,
Jesu Mufutuli, Nda yanda kwakwe,
U li kufutuka, A kukomana,
Ndi la bula bonse, Izyina lyako;
Luse lu la ndi pa Ku kambuka.
Nguni u li mbuli Mwami wa Salema;
U landi yandisya U la ndi gwasya
Ndi la ku mu lumba A lwimbo lwini,
Menda a kuseka U landi nwisya.
